verses.content: Levi naupasalhai chu: Gerson, Kohath le Merari.
Kohath naupasalhai chu: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel an nih.
Amram nauhai chu: Aron, Mosie le Miriam. Aron naupasalhai chu: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar an nih.
Eleazar chun Phinehas a nei a, Phinehas chun Abisua a nei a;
Abisua chun Bukki a nei a; Bukki chun Uzzi a nei a;
Uzzi chun Zerahia a nei a, Zerahia chun Meraioth a nei a;
Meraioth chun Amaria a nei a; Amaria chun Ahitub a nei a;
Ahitub chun Zadok a nei a; Zadok chun Ahimaaz a nei a;
Ahimaaz chun Azaria a nei a; Azaria chun Johanan a nei a;
Johanan chun Azaria a nei a, (Jerusalema Solomon a in bâwla thiempu sinthaw ding tira um kha a nih).
Azaria chun Amaria a nei a, Amaria chun Ahitub a nei a;
Ahitub chun Zadok a nei a, Zadok chun Sallum a nei a;
Sallum chun Hilkia a nei a, Hilkia chun Azaria a nei a;
Azaria chun Seraia a nei a, Seraia chun Jehozadak a nei a;
Jehozadak chu sala ṭhuoiin a um a, Nebukadnezzar kuta LALPAIN Juda le Jerusalem ân ṭhuoi hmangtir lai khan.
Levi naupasalhai chu: Gerson, Kohath le Merari.
Chun, hienghai hi Gerson naupasalhai hming chu a nih: Libni le Simei hi.
Kohath naupasalhai chu: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel an nih.
Merari naupasalhai chu: Mahli le Musi. Hieng hi an pahnam ang peia Levi hnam sûngkuohai chu an nih.
Gerson naupa chu Libni a na, ama naupa chu Jahath, ama naupa chu Zimma,
ama naupa chu Joa, ama naupa chu Iddo, ama naupa chu Zera, ama naupa chu Jeatherai.
Kohath naupasalhai chu, Amminadab. Ama naupa chu Kora, ama naupa chu Assir,
ama naupa chu Elkana, ama naupa chu Ebiasaph, ama naupa chu Assir a na;
ama naupa chu Tahath, ama naupa chu Uriel, ama naupa chu Uzzia, ama naupa chu Saul.
Chun, Elkana naupasalhai chu: Amasai le Ahimoth.
Elkana thua chun, Elkana naupasalhai chu: ama naupa Zophai, ama naupa Nahath;
ama naupa Eliab, ama naupa Jeroham, ama naupa Elkana.
Samuel naupasalhai chu: nau lutîr chu Joel, a pahnina Abija.
Merari naupasalhai chu: Mahli, ama naupa Libni, ama naupa Simei, ama naupa Uzza;
ama naupa Simea, ama naupa Haggia, ama naupa Asaia.
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu a um ṭawk ṭawk hnunga, LALPA ina hla tienga rawngbâwla Davidin a siehai chu hienghai hi an nih.
Chuongchun, Jerusalem khuoa Solomonin LALPA in a bâwl hmakhat khan, inkhâwmna puon in biekbûk tuola chun hlain rawng an bâwl hlak a; an indawt ang peiin an rawngbâwl hun chu an nghâk hlak a.
Chun, hienghai hi a thawktu zinghai le an naupasalhai chu an nih. Kohath mi naupasalhai chu: hla sak mi Heman, Joel naupa, Samuel naupa chu;
Elkana naupa, Jeroham naupa, Eliel naupa, Toa naupa;
Zuph naupa, Elkana naupa, Mahath naupa, Amasai naupa;
Elkana naupa, Joel naupa, Azaria naupa, Zephania naupa;
Tahath naupa, Assir naupa, Ebiasaph naupa, Kora naupa;
Izhar naupa, Kohath naupa, Levi naupa, Israel naupa a nih.
Chun, a unaupa Asaph chu a changtienga ngîr hlak a na, chu Asaph ngei chu Berekia naupa a nih; Simea naupa;
Mikael naupa, Baaseia naupa, Malkija naupa;
Ethni naupa, Zera naupa, Adaia naupa,
Ethan naupa, Zimma naupa, Simei naupa a nih.
Jahath naupa, Gerson naupa, Levi naupa a nih.
Chun, vawitienga chun an unau Merari naupasalhai chu: Kisi naupa Ethan, Abdi naupa, Malluk naupa,
Hasabia naupa, Amazia naupa, Hilkia naupa;
Amzi naupa, Bani naupa, Semer naupa;
Mahli naupa, Musi naupa, Merari naupa, Levi naupa a nih.
Chun, an unauhai Levi mihai chu Pathien ina biekbûka rawng- bâwlna po poa châng ding chun ruot an ni tah a.

Amiruokchu, Aron le a naupa- salhai chu, Pathien siehlaw Mosien thu a lo pêk ta po po ang khan Israel- hai ta dinga intlanna siempêk dingin le, hmun inthiengtaka rawngbâwlna po poa ding chun pumrawhmang thilinhlânna mâichâm chunga le riminhnik rawna mâichâm chunga chun thil an inhlân a.
Chun, hienghai hi Aron naupa- salhai chu an nih: ama naupa chu Eleazar, ama naupa chu Phinehas, ama naupa chu Abisua;
ama naupa chu Bukki, ama naupa chu Uzzi, ama naupa chu Zerahia;
ama naupa chu Meraioth, ama naupa chu Amaria, ama naupa chu Ahitub;
ama naupa chu Zadok, ama naupa chu Ahimaaz a nih.
Chun, hieng hi an ram sûnga an riebûk hmun ang peia an umna hmun hai chu a nih: Kohath mi sûngkuo, Aron naupasalhai chu, chan hmasa- tak chu anni ta a ni leiin,
anni chu Juda rama Hebron le a vêlhai po po le chun pêk an na;
amiruokchu, a khawpui phûl le a khawperhai chu Jephunne naupa Kaleb kuomah an pêk a.
Aron naupasalhai kuoma chun himna khawpui Hebron chu a pêk a; Libna chu a vêl khuohai leh, Jattir le Estemoa, a vêl khuohai leh,
Hilen, a vêl khuohai leh, Debir, a vêl khuohai leh;
Asan, a vêl khuohai leh, Beth- semes, a vêl khuohai leh;
chun, Benjamin hnama in- thawk chun; Geba, a vêl khuohai leh, Alemeth, a vêl khuohai leh, Anathoth a vêl khuohai leh. An pahnam po poa an khawpuihai po po chu khuo sâwm le pathum a nih.
Chun, Kohath naupasal dang- hai kuoma chun aisâna pêkin, hnam sûngkuo tina inthawk le, hnam zât- vea inthawk, Manasse hnam zâtvea inthawkin khawpui sâwm a nih.

Gerson naupasalhai kuoma chun an pahnam ang peiin, Issakar hnam chanpuola inthawk le, Aser hnam chanpuola inthawk le, Naph- tali hnam chanpuola inthawk le Basana Manasse hnam chanpuola inthawkin khawpui sâwm le pathum an pêk a.
Merari naupasalhai kuoma chun aisâna pêkin, an pahnam ang peiin, Reuben hnam chanpuola in- thawk le, Gad hnam chanpuola inthawk le Zebulun hnam chanpuola inthawkin khawpui sâwm le pahni an pêk a.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun Levi mihai chu khawpui le a vêl khuohai chu an pêk a.
Juda thlahai hnam chanpuola inthawk dâm, Simeon thlahai hnam chanpuola inthawk dâm, Benjamin thlahai hnam chanpuola inthawk dâmin hieng khawpui a hming hrila umhai hi, aisâna pêk an nih.
Chun, Kohath naupasalhai pa- hnam ṭhenkhat chun an biel sûnga chun Ephraim hnam chanpuola inthawk dâmin khawpuihai an nei a.
An kuoma Ephraim tlâng rama himna khawpui Sekem chu a vêl khuohai le chun an pêk a; Gezer le a vêl khuohai le khawm chun;
chun, Jokmeam, a vêl khuohai le chun, Beth-horon, a vêl khuohai leh;
Aijalon, a vêl khuohai leh, Gath-rimmon, a vêl khuohai leh;
Manasse hnam zâtve chanpuola inthawk chun: Aner, a vêl khuohai leh, Bileam, a vêl khuohai leh, Kohath naupasalhai pahnam dang- hai ta dinga pêk a na;
Gerson naupasalhai kuoma chun aisânin, Manasse hnam zâtve chanpuola inthawkin Basana Golan chu a vêl khuohai leh pêk a na;
Issakar hnama inthawkin Kedes, a vêl khuohai leh, Daberath, a vêl khuohai leh;
Ramoth, a vêl khuohai leh, Anem, a vêl khuohai leh;
chun, Aser hnam chanpuola inthawkin: Masal, a vêl khuohai leh, Abdon, a vêl khuohai leh;
Hukok, a vêl khuohai leh, Rehob, a vêl khuohai leh;
Naphtali hnam chanpuola in- thawkin: Galilia Kades, a vêl khuohai leh, Hammon, a vêl khuohai leh, Kiriath-aim, a vêl khuohai leh.
Levi mihai mi dang, Merari naupasalhai kuoma chun Zebulun hnam chanpuola inthawkin Rimmon, a vêl khuohai leh; Tabor, a vêl khuohai leh;
chun, Jordan râla Jeriko vêlah, Jordan saktieng panga chun Reuben hnam chanpuola inthawkin thlalêra Bezer, a vêl khuohai leh pêk an nih; Jahza, a vêl khuohai leh,
Kedemoth, a vêl khuohai leh Mephaath, a vêl khuohai leh;
Gad hnam chanpuola inthawk- in Gilead rama Ramoth, a vêl khuo- hai leh, Mahanaim, a vêl khuohai leh,
Hesbon, a vêl khuohai leh, Jazer, a vêl khuohai leh.
